thread.title: WEATHER EXTRA: Strong storms bring heavy rainfall
thread.title_full: WEATHER EXTRA: Strong storms bring heavy rainfall

author: @wilxTV
title: WEATHER EXTRA: Strong storms bring heavy rainfall
text: WEATHER EXTRA: Strong storms bring heavy rainfall LANSING, Mich. (WILX) - Widely scattered showers and thunderstorms will continue to pass over the area Friday afternoon. Any thunderstorm in the afternoon could produce localized heavy rainfall, but severe weather is not expected. High temperatures top out in the low to mid 80s and the humidity levels remain high. First Alert Chief Meteorologist Darrin Rockcole is live at the News 10+ Digital Desk with what you need to know. Join us during any of our livestreams on [YouTube ](https://www.youtube.com/@wilxtv)to chat with us LIVE! If you have questions or comments, ask away and we’ll see your questions in real time! Plus, you can find more stories and extras on our [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@wilxnews10)! ALMANAC INFORMATION for August 2, 2024 - Average High: 82º Average Low 61º - Lansing Record High: 100° 1964 - Lansing Record Low: 40° 1927 - Jackson Record High: 102º 1964 - Jackson Record Low: 41º 1927 Download the free News 10 First Alert Weather App for forecast updates, radar, and severe weather notifications right to your smartphone.
